title: Create your account
pPassword: Create a password (min 6 characters, include letters)
skipNote: A default blank profile picture will be used. You can add your photo later.
errImageLarge: Image is too large. Please upload an image under 5MB.
errFillAll: Please fill in all required fields.
errGmailOnly: Please enter a valid Gmail address (@gmail.com).
errPasswordLen: Password must be at least 6 characters long.
errNeedPicOrSkip: Please select a profile picture or choose to skip.
errRegisterGeneric: Registration error. Please try again later.
